mapper.select:
select v.id, v.fecha, v.cliente_id, v.comprobante_id, v.subtotal_inafecto, v.subtotal_exonerado, v.subtotal_afecto, v.total_monto, v.total_afecto_isc, v.igv, v.isc, v.estado, v.user_id, v.pagado, v.hora, v.empresa_id, v.activo, v.borrado, v.created_at, v.updated_at, v.tipo, v.almacen_id, v.numero_venta, v.cantidad_icbper, v.monto_icbper,
c.id as cli_id, c.nombre as cli_nombre, c.tipo_documento_id as cli_tipo_documento_id, c.documento as cli_documento, c.direccion as cli_direccion, c.telefono as cli_telefono, c.correo1 as cli_correo1, c.correo2 as cli_correo2, c.user_id as cli_user_id, c.empresa_id as cli_empresa_id, c.activo as cli_activo, c.borrado as cli_borrado,
co.id as co_id, co.serie as co_serie, co.numero as co_numero, co.cantidad_digitos as co_cantidad_digitos, co.init_comprobante_id as co_init_comprobante_id, co.estado as co_estado, co.empresa_id as co_empresa_id, co.user_id as co_user_id, co.activo as co_activo, co.borrado as co_borrado, co.almacen_id as co_almacen_id,
u.id as user_id, u.name as user_name, u.email as user_email, u.tipo_user_id as user_tipo_user_id, u.user_id as user_user_id, u.empresa_id as user_empresa_id, u.activo as user_activo, u.borrado as user_borrado, u.almacen_id as user_almacen_id,
du.id as du_id, du.nombres as du_nombres, du.apellido_paterno as du_apellido_paterno, du.apellido_materno as du_apellido_materno, du.direccion as du_direccion, du.telefono as du_telefono, du.tipo_documento_id as du_tipo_documento_id, du.documento as du_documento, du.email as du_email, du.user_id as du_user_id, du.user_gestiona_id as du_user_gestiona_id, du.empresa_id as du_empresa_id, du.activo as du_activo, du.borrado as du_borrado,
a.id as al_id, a.nombre as al_nombre, a.direccion as al_direccion, a.empresa_id as al_empresa_id, a.user_id as al_user_id, a.activo as al_activo, a.borrado as al_borrado, a.distrito_id as al_distrito_id, a.codigo as al_codigo,
TRUNCATE(@a:= v.total_monto,2) AS importe_total, TRUNCATE(@b:=(SELECT IFNULL(SUM(cv.`importe`),0.00) As montoCobrado FROM `cobro_ventas` cv WHERE cv.`venta_id`=v.`id` and cv.borrado !='1'),2) AS monto_cobrado, TRUNCATE(@a-@b,2) AS monto_por_cobrar
from ventas v inner join almacens a on a.id = v.almacen_id inner join users u on u.id = v.user_id left join datos_users du on du.user_id = u.id left join clientes c on c.id = v.cliente_id left join comprobantes co on co.id = v.comprobante_id left join init_comprobantes ic on ic.id = co.init_comprobante_id
mapper.update:
update ventas
fecha = #{FECHA}, cliente_id = #{CLIENTE_ID}, cliente_id = NULL, comprobante_id = #{COMPROBANTE_ID}, subtotal_inafecto = #{SUBTOTAL_INAFECTO}, subtotal_exonerado = #{SUBTOTAL_EXONERADO}, subtotal_afecto = #{SUBTOTAL_AFECTO}, total_monto = #{TOTAL_MONTO}, total_afecto_isc = #{TOTAL_AFECTO_ISC}, igv = #{IGV}, isc = #{ISC}, estado = #{ESTADO}, pagado = #{PAGADO}, hora = #{HORA},
user_id = #{USER_ID}, activo = #{ACTIVO}, borrado = #{BORRADO}, tipo = #{TIPO}, almacen_id = #{ALMACEN_ID}, numero_venta = #{NUMERO_VENTA}, cantidad_icbper = #{CANTIDAD_ICBPER}, monto_icbper = #{MONTO_ICBPER},
updated_at = #{UPDATED_AT},
where id=#{ID} and empresa_id=#{EMPRESA_ID}
